pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.6: See _bhikkhu-pācittiya_ 14, [](pli-tv-bu-vb-pc14:2.1.9), for further explanations of these terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.2.2: _Āyoga_. Used as a support for the _pallattikā_ sitting posture. See “A Translation and Analysis of the Pātimokkha”, by Bhikkhu Ñāṇatusita, p.259 (re. _sekhiya_ 26).
